text: kharekhara te'o nukasanamam padi gaya, jemane potana santanane phakata ajnanata ane murkhatana karane katala kari didha, ane je vastu te lokone allaha'e khava-piva mate api, tene harama theravi didhi, allaha para juthanum theravavana karane, ni:Sanka a loko pathabhrastatamam padi gaya ane kyareya satyamarga para calavavala na ban'ya
